meta.evidence: \begin{tabular}{l} s/-PollPDU Parameter value of pollPDU for RLC AM for NR sidelink communications, seeTS 38.322 [4]. Value p 4 corresponds to 4 PDUs, value p 8 corresponds to 8 PDUs and so on. infinity corresponds to an infinite number of PDUs. \end{tabular} \begin{tabular}{l} si-SN-FieldLength This field indicates the RLC SN field size for NR sidelink communication, see TS 38.322 [4]. For groupcast and broadcast, only value size 6 ( 6 bits) is configured for the field si-SN-FieldLengthUM. \end{tabular}
